text: Ann Carol Crispin (April 5, 1950 â€“ September 6, 2013) was an American science fiction writer. She wrote twenty-three published books. Her writing career began in 1983. She wrote several books related to Star Trek. Crispin was born in Stamford, Connecticut. She died from cancer in Maryland.
